website_summaries.verdict: Goes on smoothly and is easy to blend - a good choice for a "smokey eye" look. However, the pencil design could be better considering the price.
pros: Lasts a long time for most wearers
Gel formula is highly pigmented, so you don't have to use a lot to get the desired effect
cons: Product has been known to fall out of the pencil and is a bit difficult to sharpen

customer_reviews.title: $25.00+ for an inch of product!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is ridiculous! It's so deceiving! It cosmetics should be ashamed of themselves. You think you will be able to use the whole eyeliner pencil, when in fact you are paying for an inch of eyeliner (if that) You can't sharpen it, even though it has a sharpener. You have to twist it up in order to get more of the eyeliner, which after about 20 uses falls out. You are left with a full size plastic hollow tube, that will go into the landfill. The eyeliner itself is good for the waterline of your eyes, it has long staying power, however as other reviewers have said it is so thick and it can get in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED IN PIECES - WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I am furious. My product arrived and the eyeliner was completely broken. I opened the box. The crayon fell right out of the shaft it came in, broken into pieces, the twisting mechanism on the bottom fell right off. The item literally fell apart and all the makeup fell out and was even further destroyed the second I opened the box. By the time I found out it could be returned, I had already sweeped up the pieces to discard it and clean the mess. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyN10

customer_reviews.title: Definitely “no tug”! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this from a cosmetic store. I already use their eyebrow pencils and love it, so I thought I’d give this a try. When it says “no tug”....it means no tug. It glides on so smooth, I don’t have to pull my lower lash line out. It’s pricy, but you pay for what you get. It stays on all day and has great color. I will only use this eyeliner from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Packaging keeps arriving broken or breaks off with the slightest drop!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for more than a year now. I order through Amazon because it’s more convenient for me than going to the Ulta store to get it. However, I just had to return one because it was broken. It was replaced immediately which is good. However again, I was just freshening up my makeup for a work event and dropped my liner not even 12 inches to the floor and the damn thing broke AGAIN!!!! Now I can’t twist it to use it and that’s $20 plus dollars down the drain!!! I don’t understand this breaking so easily. Grrrrrr.....
customer_reviews.author: Donna Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product great but does not extend or retract which makes for a very expensive waste of money. Customer service was very unsatifactory. Do not buy from this group.
customer_reviews.author: Sheronne Pickering

customer_reviews.title: ~Excellent and No-Pain Gel Eyeliner!~
customer_reviews.text: ~In my above photo, I am wearing the IT Gel Eyeliner, Black... This eyeliner stays on for a lengthy time and for me, it is waterproof. Now, when applying, do Not ‘over apply’ because it will become ‘cakey’... You need to only apply one line(or maybe 2 if you need to fix the line)... It feels great on and washes off easily!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Love

customer_reviews.title: One was fine; the other is totally dried out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and the first one i used was fine. When I used up that one and started using the second one, I was very disappointed because this one was very dried out, so I couldn't even get it to apply to my eyelids without the product breaking off. Unfortunately, since I didn't open this one until after the return window closed, I am stuck with a product that I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: wild4horses

customer_reviews.title: Nice liner
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented . A little goes a long way. Using an eyeliner brush works better for me. If I use the pencil directly on the water line I tend to get too much as it really glides on smoothly but also heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderelly

customer_reviews.title: more hype than substance
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be the one!!! But it doesn't last for the entire day...this company must spend more on advertisement than research...disappointed as it was expensive and Revlon water proof liner lasts longer and has a brush to smudge as well...
customer_reviews.author: tra

customer_reviews.title: quality eyeliner, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner!! It's pricey (for me lol) but it's the only one I use. Especially if I know i'm going to be out and about, sweating, etc. Not waterproof in the sense that you can swim with it, but definitely stays on during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: No tug and it lasts all day even if you’re 56 or older!
customer_reviews.text: It really is a no tug mascara and it stays on all day! I am 56 in my eyes do not have the elasticity they used to have so eyeliner for me is tricky. This one works great and it really does last me all day.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Liked it as a sample. But the full size product doesn’t stay put at all!
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Apparently Discontinued and/or Reformulated
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. ULTA sales clerk told me it was discontinued. Loved the brown-black color and because it stayed on all day. Was glad I found it one last time.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMarie113

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find a pencil that applied easily with first ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find a pencil that applied easily with first swipe. I had been using the hard lead pencils, Estee Lauder, and six versions of Loreal. It is like my lid is so oily the pencil won't abhere unless I resharpen or wipe with tissue and before I know it the pencil is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeliner. I didn't realize that other eyeliners tugged (pulled at your skin or got caught on eyelashes) until I used this. The application is very smooth, it goes on dark the first time, and it lasts a long time. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jemarilys

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave the cover off
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner because it’s so smooth and easy to put on is definitely no tugging however if you happen to leave the cover off even just for one day it dries up the stick it’s also hard to use the self enclosed sharpener on the end of the pencil but otherwise I’d like this product
customer_reviews.author: North Star

customer_reviews.title: Great Liner Pencil! Sharpening is challenging.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to break off the tip of the liner when sharpening and so I don't sharpen as often as I'd like. I also have broken several of the ends of the liner pencil where the built in-sharpener is located. But the liner glides on easily and stays on for the day. I like this liner better than any other I've tried and I'm in my early 50's. And it is nice to have the built in sharpener but remember to be careful when sharpening!
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Only eyeliner I use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I use. I’m blind in one eye and can’t see to use most liners but this one goes on so easy it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Gel liner
customer_reviews.text: Gel tip cannot be lengthened. I'm assuming the only way to do this is to sharpen it. I tried that and it was messy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Really is a no tug product.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, this really doesn’t tug the eyelid when applying. Stays on all day and doesn’t smudge easily.
customer_reviews.author: L Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not a lot of product
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner looks good and stays on for a long time. But the value is not that great. There's not a lot of product in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzy5280

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Value for money and it goes on smoothly really is a no tug eyeliner have been using it for a while
customer_reviews.author: Angey

customer_reviews.title: Had such high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this eyeliner...but it's seriously not any better than the Covergirl and Lancome I was alternatively using. The gel still smears and ends up under my eyes (I don't put it under my eyes; some of it just ends up there), and the sharpener did NOT sharpen the eyeliner to a small enough point. So I was left with a huge surface, which did not look pretty on my eyelids. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: April S

customer_reviews.title: Long-Lasting and No Smudge
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! Doesn’t smudge or wear off by the end of the day. But yet, easy to remove when it’s bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand, it goes on smooth for aged skin. It stays on hours. Recurved right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fav eye pencil
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found it on amazon. I think It has discontinued this color.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This has really staying power and goes on smoothly, the stick however is not as long as the case and will be used up quickly if used every day, for the price it needs to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McClaren

customer_reviews.title: So hard the color would not go on smooth. ...
customer_reviews.text: So hard the color would not go on smooth.... it's supposed to be no tug but it tugged. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Best, long lasting, eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product- it stays where it’s placed and doesn’t smudge. It’s still in place at the end of a long day. I’ve found my forever eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnKay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, been ordering it time after time
customer_reviews.text: product is great price is too high, but i keep going back for more. I love her products.. let me know when the sales are
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Such Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product from “It” Cosmetics, then EBay and now Amazon. Love the application and staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Lindiblu

customer_reviews.title: quality, good color
customer_reviews.text: Liked this version a lot better than the new colors they got !!! Guess we'll have to find something else
customer_reviews.author: MARTINA HOHNER

customer_reviews.title: It’s got it
customer_reviews.text: My what big eyes you have. It’s the it’s got it❣️ IT factor

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner applies extremely smooth, no pulling or tugging on your skin. It lasts nicely with a powder base for a good 8 hours. I wish it were a finer/thinner line, but overall, a great liner.
customer_reviews.author: DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't run, color stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this color in stores anymore. Great product, stays on for 12+ hours without running.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed-!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't tug, that is true, but it sure does flake off. I won't be buying it again that is for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gay

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth application.
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner. It goes on smoothly and stays on all day. I’ve now bought it twice and I will continue to make sure I always have a spay.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Stays All Day
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eyeliner. It stays put all day and comes off easily when you’re ready to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great but highly expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner but poorly constructed. The bottom came off and I thought the whole length of the pencil has the products, but only one small portion at the tip has it and the rest is empty! This is HIGHLY expensive for just a little amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: NKKMD

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time and glides on so easily. It looks rich and stays true to your application until you take it off!
customer_reviews.author: NanaBear

customer_reviews.title: Won’t make a point for thin application
customer_reviews.text: Still have to pull eye corners. Doesn’t form a point.
customer_reviews.author: Texas gramma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best eyeliner ever. Does not smudge, and lasts all day. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It does "tug"
customer_reviews.text: For the price, not really worth it. You can buy a drug store brand for less than half and better quality. I like it Cosmetics - but not this particular item. - smears easily - does not "glide" on easy - does not sharpen so the end can be blunt and wide
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love IT makeup. This is my favorite eyeliner and color. But I just found out they discontinued that color. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you use it for..
customer_reviews.text: Nice but only for upper eye lid, does not cover or have any staying power on water line on bottom lis
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I had to adjust from liquid eyeliner to the gel pen so it took a couple of times to get the feel for applying.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat

customer_reviews.title: The IT eye pencil has it!
customer_reviews.text: With aging, I have found that I need to use a waterproof eye pencil. This is a fantastic eye pencil that does not pull and tug when you apply it. It stays in place all day perfect for the woman on the girl!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Freidenrich

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy but Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Product does not apply smoothly, or evenly. Broke off the tip on first use.. Consistency is clumpy. But, It does seem to last, I had to really scrub to get it off..
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gapinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product - easy to use and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was thinner but good if you like to smudge for smokey look
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner works great for me! Applies smoothly and doesn't crumble like other liners. Has stayed on even during sweaty workouts and tears. Hasn't bothered my sensitive eyes or skin around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color as the black was too dark and harsh looking on me.
customer_reviews.author: humynbrd

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I've ever used (and my eyes get irritated easily). Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Difficult application
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but, felt it was very hard to apply if you have wrinkles. The “no tug“ statement is deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEST BEST
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner ever- goes on so smooth and doesn’t smear. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Dries up
customer_reviews.text: Dried up immediately. Worthless product. $8.00 maybelline gel is 10x better
customer_reviews.author: brett elizabeth derryberry

customer_reviews.title: It Cosmetics No-tug waterproof Pencil receive (5) Star. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It Cosmetics No-tug waterproof Pencil receive (5) Star. It last all day! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t “tug” but it sure smudges. Not exactly waterproof either.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: By far the best eyeliner I ever tried! Stays put until I wash it off at night! Goes on perfectly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: lisa k

customer_reviews.title: Really stays on.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner ever!!! Only eyeliner I have ever used that does not run down my face
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn N. Nunes

customer_reviews.title: The one I have directly from the is amazing, this one was awful and wouldn't apply
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to be a real Itcosmetics liner. The one I have directly from the is amazing, this one was awful and wouldn't apply. Lesson learned not to purchase make up from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Addis

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t run later in the day, it stays in place, it lasts longer than any other eyeliner I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Taylorfan

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner is amazing. It lasts all day and does not smear
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is amazing. It lasts all day and does not smear. I have tried many brands and this is the best by far. Quick delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: This is IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT products and this one did not disappoint. Easy to use, stays on until you take it off. IT products are superior to others and I would recommend ANY IT product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Win - Win 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Goes on so smoothly, perfect color that goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner. I have been searching for this my ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner. I have been searching for this my whole life. All the other eyeliners that said they were no run and color stay never worked. This is the only eyeliner that actually stays where you put it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Arminio

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on at the waterpark! Will definitely continue to use! Best eyeliner I've ever used. I usually apply at around 7 am and the only thing that needs to be touched up is the outer corner at about 5pm.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Once you buy this you'll never go back to another liner! Seriously love this product!
customer_reviews.author: H Spaugh

customer_reviews.title: The pencil  is very hard
customer_reviews.text: The eye pencil I have ordered was very dry I can't us it
customer_reviews.author: marine minasyan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The end get breaking off. Not happy with this. I need to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Not all that its cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: Does not go on as described. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING EYE LINNER
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner is AMAZING. It doesn’t smudge by the end of the day. love it
customer_reviews.author: Ponset1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It goes on smoothly and stays longer than any other I've tried!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good eyeliner although a bit pricy. It is easy to apply and lasts all day.

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake. Don't buy it! It doesn't even twist up

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it at all. Too drying on my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner that I have tried that doesn't smudge after you put it on your eyes! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: no tug
customer_reviews.text: i love how easy it is to put on - no tug

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There is a built in sharpening mechanism on the end which does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this liner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye liner. It rolls on very smoothly with no tug. It also lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner stays on all day, it's a little pricey but worth IT. I use coconut oil to remove my makeup and that's when the eyeliner comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO&BJ

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective will not retract up or down - brand new just took out of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J.

customer_reviews.title: It delivers
customer_reviews.text: I first got this as a sample in one of my monthly bags from Sephora. So far its one of the best products I've gotten so I had to purchase the full size. It stays on all night doesn't run even after a night of dancing and sweating.
customer_reviews.author: jenelle

customer_reviews.title: This is the only eyeliner that I can wear on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner that I can wear on my water line with my contacts in. All others just bled into my eye and would smear my contacts. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Even with primer underneath this did not stay on more than a couple hours. It might stay on your hand like demonstrations on QVC but not eyes! Total joke. Wish I hadn't waited so long to send back. Dollar Tree probably has better eyeliner.

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: my wifes purchase, not mine she seems to like it

customer_reviews.title: Speed
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and didn't have time to go to Ulta.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best eyeliner I have EVER used! It does not run or smudge. It stays right in place until you choose to take makeup off! Love it and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner is absolutely amazing! No tugging as you apply it
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is absolutely amazing! No tugging as you apply it. Literally stays on all day. Well worth the money. Also has a built in sharpener. I have already ordered this in different colors.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great for inner eye lining, it is the best at not running and it doesn't irritate m eyes.

customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly and doesn't run all day. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this liner! Won't ever need to buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth. Good quality product. Love the deep navy color.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Trust me, my eyeliner is my signature
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every eyeliner and without fail, it always gets on my upper eyelid and smudges. It was almost as if my tears were acid, nothing worked. I got this as a sample in my Ipsy bag and packed it on a trip because it was compact. I received so many compliments on my eyeliner and it lasted all night and never smudged. It even survived an outside summer wedding in the south! I have never tried this brand before they made me a fan. Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this highlighter stick, have one that is almost gone so glad I could get these! they rock and are precision application!
